title: Extends the authorization of the county of Chenango to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Chenango to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2013.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Chenango to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
